General.Name: Stroud Resources Ltd
General.Description: Stroud Resources Ltd., a junior resource company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Mexico and Canada. It operates in two segments, Mineral Exploration; and Oil and Gas Exploration and Development. The company explores for silver and gold deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Santo Domingo silver-gold project covering an area of 135 hectares located in the State of Jalisco, Mexico; and a 3.75% interest in six natural gas producing wells in central Alberta, Canada. The company also has interests in Hislop Gold project and Leckie Gold project. Stroud Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 1090 Don Mills Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M3C 3R6
